summary: Increases the speeds for some of the wild animals
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=red]*ATTN: This mod is old (feb 2012), unsupported and I have no interest in doing anything with it. Im not even sure if this is needed anymore, for all I know the speeds may have been tweaked (and likely to better values) via the unofficial patch mods or some other mod(s)*[/color][/b]

This increases the speeds for some of the wild animals running around. I noticed that they just seemed to be too slow. This mod is far from perfect speeds but I think its an improvement and besides it is just something I quickly did while browsing around in the CK..

Any suggestions or animals I missed are appreciated...

Animal Speed Changes:

Bears
- Default: 100
- New: 150

Deer
- Default: 100
- New: 175

Elk
- Default: 100
- New: 175

Fox
- Default: 100
- New: 175

Goat (wild)
- Default: 100
- New: 150

Hare
- Default: 150
- New: 200

Sabre
- Default: 100
- New: 175

Wolf
- Default: 100
- New: 150
author: diamond-optic
